summary.para: Contains information about the partitions of a drive.
The number of partitions on a drive.
On disks with the MBR layout, this value is always a multiple of 4. Any partitions that are unused have a partition type of PARTITION_ENTRY_UNUSED (0).

member.name: DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION.PartitionEntry
member.summary: A variable-sized array of structures, one structure for each partition on a drive.
